subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba scored with six minutes left to give Chelsea a 2-1 win over Arsenal and a place in the F.A. Cup final on May 30. Chelsea advanced to its second final in three years and will play for the title against the winner of Sunday’s semifinal between Manchester United and Everton. It was Chelsea’s first F.A. Cup win over Arsenal since 1947.
